properties.name: security.jwt.token.secret-key
properties.description: Secret string used for JWT signing and validation (we recommend to generate some randomly).

properties.name: security.jwt.token.expiration
properties.description: Number of days until a token expires.

properties.name: dummy.server.username
properties.description: Dummy Server Username is used for initial database setup in 'development' mode

properties.name: dummy.server.hostname
properties.description: Dummy Hostname Username is used for initial database setup in 'development' mode

properties.name: dummy.server.privateKey
properties.description: Dummy Private Key Username is used for initial database setup in 'development' mode

properties.name: dummy.server.publicKey
properties.description: Dummy Public Key Username is used for initial database setup in 'development' mode

properties.name: dummy.instance.url
properties.description: Dummy Instance URL is used for initial database setup in 'development' mode

properties.name: dummy.instance.jwtSecret
properties.description: Dummy Instance JWT Secret is used for initial database setup in 'development' mode
